sense.gloss: control, bringing under control, settling (a matter), putting in order

sdata.j: ↑事態↑↓じたい↓の|↑収拾|↑↓しゅうしゅう↓がつかなくなったら、↑昨日↑↓きのう↓↑渡↑↓わた↓した↑番号↑↓ばんごう↓で↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑電話↑↓でんわ↓をかけなさい。
sdata.e: If things get out of hand, you should call me at the number I gave you yesterday.

sdata.j: ↑事態↑↓じたい↓は|↑収拾|↑↓しゅうしゅう↓に↑向↑↓む↓かいつつある。
sdata.e: The situation is gradually moving towards a resolution.
